+
+build.version = 4.2.1
+build.milestone = dev
+build.number = b00
+
+build.classes = ${BUILD_DIR}/classes
+build.junit.classes = ${BUILD_DIR}/classes.junit
+build.dir = build
+build.tmp = ${BUILD_DIR}/tmp
+legal.dir = legal
+src.dir = src
+doc.dir = doc
+exam.dir = examples
+javadoc.dir = ${BUILD_DIR}/javadoc
+
+javadoc.additionalparam =
+javadoc.author = false
+javadoc.encoding = iso-8859-1
+javadoc.noindex = false
+javadoc.nonavbar = false
+javadoc.notree = false
+javadoc.private = false
+javadoc.splitindex = true
+javadoc.use = true
+javadoc.version = false
+javadoc.windowtitle = JT Harness Version 4.2.1
+javadoc.footer = Copyright 1996-2009 Sun Microsystems, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
+
+run.class = com.sun.javatest.tool.Main
+jdk14.classpath = ${jhalljar}:${servletjar}
+jdk11.classpath = ${jcommjar}
+javadoc.classpath = ${jdk11.classpath}:${jdk14.classpath}
+run.classpath = ${build.classes}:${jhjar}
+
+javahelp.missing = Please specify a 'jhall.jar' location in the 'local.properties' file.
+jcomm.missing = Please specify the location of the serial communcations API implementation jar (comm.jar) in the 'local.properties' file.
+servlet.missing = Please specify a 'servlet.jar' location in the 'local.properties' file.
+junit.missing = Please specify a 'junit.jar' location in the 'local.properties' file.
+jemmy.missing = Please specify a 'jemmy.jar' location in the 'local.properties' file.
+
+run.class.missing = Must select one file in the IDE or set run.class
+
+javatest.splash = spl_42
+
+test.i18n.dynamic.class = com.sun.jct.utils.i18ncheck.I18NDynamicMain
+test.i18n.static.class = com.sun.jct.utils.i18ncheck.I18NStaticMain
+test.dir = tests

+<?xml version='1.0' encoding='ISO-8859-1' ?>
+<!--
+  $Id$
+
+  Copyright 1996-2009 Sun Microsystems, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.
+  DO NOT ALTER OR REMOVE COPYRIGHT NOTICES OR THIS FILE HEADER.
+
+ This code is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it
+ under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 only, as
+ published by the Free Software Foundation.  Sun designates this
+ particular file as subject to the "Classpath" exception as provided
+ by Sun in the LICENSE file that accompanied this code.
+
+ This code is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
+ ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
+ FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License
+ version 2 for more details (a copy is included in the LICENSE file that
+ accompanied this code).
+
+ You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
+ 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
+ Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
+
+ Please contact Sun Microsystems, Inc., 4150 Network Circle, Santa Clara,
+ CA 95054 USA or visit www.sun.com if you need additional information or
+ have any questions.
+-->
+<project name="jtharness" default="test-gui" basedir="..">
+
+    <property file="src/local.properties"/>
+    <property file="src/build.properties"/>
+
+    <property environment="env"/>
+
+    <patternset id="helpset">
+        <include name="**/*.hs"/>
+        <include name="**/default/**"/>
+        <include name="**/images/**"/>
+        <exclude name="com/sun/javatest/tool/images/spl_*.gif"/>
+    </patternset>
+
+    <presetdef name="buildinfo">
+        <echo file="${build.classes}/buildInfo.txt"># Build info
+            date=${build.date}
+            version=${build.version}
+            milestone=${build.milestone}
+            build=${build.number}
+            java=Java(TM) 2 SDK, Version ${java.version}
+        </echo>
+    </presetdef>
+
+    <!-- ********** JT Harness *********************************************** -->
+
+    <property name="src.javatest.help" location="${src.dir}/com/sun/javatest/help"/>
+    <property name="src.javatestAgent.help" location="${src.dir}/com/sun/javatest/agent/help"/>
+    <!--
+    <property name="src.javatest.help" location="${doc.dir}/javatest/help"/>
+    <property name="src.javatestAgent.help" location="${doc.dir}/javatest/agent/help"/>
+    -->
+    <property name="build.javatest.help" location="${build.classes}/com/sun/javatest/help"/>
+    <property name="build.javatestAgent.help" location="${build.classes}/com/sun/javatest/agent/help"/>
+
+    <patternset id="interview.resources">
+        <include name="com/sun/interview/**/*.properties"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/interview/wizard/*.gif"/>
+    </patternset>
+
+    <patternset id="javatest.resources">
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/**/*.properties"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/**/*.xsd"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/**/*.gif"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/**/*.css"/>
+        <exclude name="com/sun/javatest/tool/images/spl_*.gif"/>
+    </patternset>
+
+    <patternset id="javatest.junit.resources">
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/junit/**/*.properties"/>
+    </patternset>
+
+    <patternset id="javatest.packages">
+        <include name="com/sun/interview/**"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/**"/>
+        <exclude name="com/sun/javatest/junit/**"/>
+    </patternset>
+
+    <patternset id="test.packages">
+        <include name="com/sun/jct/utils/copyrightcheck/**" />
+    </patternset>
+
+    <patternset id="javatest.jdk11.files">
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/Command.java"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/JavaTestSecurityManager.java"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/ProductInfo.java"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/Test.java"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/Status.java "/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/agent/*.java"/>
+        <exclude name="com/sun/javatest/agent/AgentClassLoader2.java"/>
+        <exclude name="com/sun/javatest/agent/AgentMonitorCommandManager.java"/>
+        <exclude name="com/sun/javatest/agent/AgentMonitorTool.java"/>
+        <exclude name="com/sun/javatest/agent/AgentMonitorToolManager.java"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/util/*.java"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/util/FileInfoCache.java"/>
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/util/ReadAheadIterator.java"/>
+    </patternset>
+
+    <patternset id="javatest.junit.packages">
+        <include name="com/sun/javatest/junit/**"/>
+    </patternset>
+
+    <!-- JAR Section -->
+    <target name="jar_artifactory">
+        <get usetimestamp="true" dest="." ignoreerrors="false">
+             <url url="${javatest.binaries}/lib/javatest.jar"/>
+        </get>
+    <get usetimestamp="true" dest="src/lib" ignoreerrors="false">
+             <url url="${hamcrest-core.binaries}/hamcrest-core-1.3.jar"/>
+        </get>
+    <get usetimestamp="true" dest="src/lib" ignoreerrors="false">
+             <url url="${junit.binaries}/junit-4.13.2.jar"/>
+        </get>
+
+    <get usetimestamp="true" dest="src/lib" ignoreerrors="false">
+             <url url="${jemmy.binaries}/jemmy-2.2.7.5.jar"/>
+        </get>
+
+    <get usetimestamp="true" dest="src/lib" ignoreerrors="false">
+             <url url="${jhall.binaries}/jhall-2.0_05.jar"/>
+        </get>
+
+    <rename src="src/lib/junit-4.13.2.jar" dest="src/lib/junit.jar"/>
+    <rename src="src/lib/hamcrest-core-1.3.jar" dest="src/lib/hamcrest.jar"/>
+    <rename src="src/lib/jemmy-2.2.7.5.jar" dest="src/lib/jemmy.jar"/>
+    <rename src="src/lib/jhall-2.0_05.jar" dest="src/lib/jh.jar"/>
+
+    </target>
+
+    <!-- JAR - JUnit Support Section -->
+
+    <!-- Compilation Section -->
+    <target name="build">
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="test-gui" depends="jar_artifactory">
+
+        <property name="tests.gui.path" value=""/>
+
+        <property name="datapath" value="src/gui/data"/>
+        <property name="example_ts_path" value="${datapath}/demots"/>
+        <property name="javatestjar_path" value="javatest.jar"/>
+
+        <property name="tests.gui.srcpath" value="src/gui/src"/>
+        <property name="tests.tempdir" value="build/tests/gui"/>
+
+        <ant antfile="src/gui-test.xml" target="run"/>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="genreport">
+        <ant antfile="src/gui-test.xml" target="genreport"/>
+    </target>
+
+</project>

@@ -0,0 +1,263 @@
+<?xml version='1.0' encoding='ISO-8859-1' ?>
+<!--
+  $Id$
+
+  Copyright (c) 2006, 2011, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+  DO NOT ALTER OR REMOVE COPYRIGHT NOTICES OR THIS FILE HEADER.
+
+  This code is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it
+  under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 only, as
+  published by the Free Software Foundation.  Oracle designates this
+  particular file as subject to the "Classpath" exception as provided
+  by Oracle in the LICENSE file that accompanied this code.
+
+  This code is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
+  ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
+  FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License
+  version 2 for more details (a copy is included in the LICENSE file that
+  accompanied this code).
+
+  You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
+  2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
+  Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
+
+  Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
+  or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
+  questions.
+-->
+
+<project name="jt_gui_test" default="init">
+<!--    <property name="jemmylib" value="./lib/jemmy.jar" used from  local.props />
+    <property name="junitlib" value="./lib/junit-4.4.jar" used from  local.props />
+    <property name="jhjar" value="./lib/jh.jar"/> used from  local.props -->
+
+    <property name="TESTS_BUILD_DIR" value="./build/"/>
+    <property name="tests.gui.path" value="./tests/gui"/>
+    <property name="example_ts_path" value="./data/demots"/>
+<!--    <property name="javatestjar_path" value="./lib/javatest.jar"/> moved to local.props -->
+    <property name="tests.gui.srcpath" value="./src"/>
+    <property name="tests.tempdir" value="${TESTS_BUILD_DIR}/tests/gui"/>
+
+    <property name="datapath" value="./data"/>
+    <property name="tests.classesdir" value="${tests.tempdir}/classes"/>
+    <property name="report.dir" value="${tests.tempdir}/report" />
+    <property name="htmlreport.dir" value="${tests.tempdir}/htmlreport" />
+
+<!--    <property name="product.name" value="JavaTest" /> moved to local.props -->
+    <property name="inittimeout" value="300000"/>
+
+    <path id="classpath">
+        <fileset dir="${tests.tempdir}">
+            <include name="*.jar" />
+        </fileset>
+    </path>
+
+    <target name="build_demoapi_simpleTags">
+                <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/demoapi"/>
+
+                <javac encoding="iso-8859-1" debug="true" source="7"
+                        srcdir="./src/gui/testsuite_src/demoapi"
+                        destdir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/demoapi">
+                </javac>
+        <jar destfile="${tests.tempdir}/temp/demoapi.jar"
+            basedir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/demoapi" index="false">
+        </jar>
+
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/simpleTags"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/simpleTags_tc"/>
+
+        <javac encoding="iso-8859-1" debug="true" source="7"
+            srcdir="./src/gui/testsuite_src_clean"
+            destdir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/simpleTags"
+            classpath="${javatestjar_path}:${tests.tempdir}/temp/demoapi.jar:${jhalljar}">
+        </javac>
+
+        <javac encoding="iso-8859-1" debug="true" source="7"
+            srcdir="./src/gui/testsuite_src"
+            destdir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/simpleTags_tc"
+            classpath="${javatestjar_path}:${tests.tempdir}/temp/demoapi.jar:${jhalljar}">
+        </javac>
+
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/simpleTags_tc">
+            <fileset dir="./src/gui/testsuite_src/src">
+                <include name="**/moreInfo/**"/>
+                <include name="**/*.properties"/>
+            </fileset>
+        </copy>
+
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/simpleTags">
+            <fileset dir="./src/gui/testsuite_src/src">
+                <include name="**/moreInfo/**"/>
+                <include name="**/*.properties"/>
+            </fileset>
+        </copy>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="build_testsuite" depends="build_demoapi_simpleTags">
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/demots"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/demots/lib"/>
+
+        <copy file="${tests.tempdir}/temp/demoapi.jar" todir="${tests.tempdir}/demots/lib/"/>
+
+        <jar destfile="${tests.tempdir}/demots/lib/jtdemots.jar"
+            basedir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/simpleTags" index="false">
+        </jar>
+
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}/demots/lib">
+            <fileset file="${javatestjar_path}"/>
+            <fileset file="${jhjar}"/>
+        </copy>
+
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}/demots">
+            <fileset dir="./src/gui/testsuite_src_clean/demots"/>
+        </copy>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="build_testsuite_tc" depends="build_demoapi_simpleTags">
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/demots_withtestcases"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/demots_withtestcases/lib"/>
+
+        <copy file="${tests.tempdir}/temp/demoapi.jar" todir="${tests.tempdir}/demots_withtestcases/lib/"/>
+
+        <jar destfile="${tests.tempdir}/demots_withtestcases/lib/jtdemots.jar"
+            basedir="${tests.tempdir}/temp/simpleTags_tc" index="false">
+        </jar>
+
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}/demots_withtestcases/lib">
+            <fileset file="${javatestjar_path}"/>
+            <fileset file="${jhjar}"/>
+        </copy>
+
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}/demots_withtestcases">
+            <fileset dir="./src/gui/testsuite_src/demots"/>
+        </copy>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="create" unless="jt_gui_test.ignore_init">
+        <delete dir="${TESTS_BUILD_DIR}"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/report"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/htmlreport"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.tempdir}/demots"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${tests.classesdir}"/>
+        <loadfile property="message" srcFile="src/local.properties" />
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}" file="${javatestjar_path}"/>
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}" file="${jemmylib}"/>
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}" file="${junitlib}"/>
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}" file="${hamcrestlib}"/>
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}" file="${jhjar}"/>
+        <copy todir="${tests.tempdir}">
+            <fileset dir="${datapath}"/>
+        </copy>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="compile" depends="create,build_testsuite,build_testsuite_tc">
+        <javac srcdir="${tests.gui.srcpath}" destdir="${tests.classesdir}" debug="true">
+                        <classpath refid="classpath"/>
+        </javac>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="init" depends="compile" unless="jt_gui_test.ignore_init">
+         <java timeout="${inittimeout}" fork="true" dir="${tests.tempdir}" failonerror="true" classname="jthtest.Init">
+             <classpath refid="classpath"/>
+                        <classpath>
+                <pathelement path="${tests.classesdir}"/>
+            </classpath>
+            <sysproperty key="jt_gui_test.name" value="${product.name}" />
+            <sysproperty key="javatest.security.noSecurityManager" value="true" />
+                        <sysproperty key="javatest.desktop.file" value="${javatest.desktop.file}"/>
+                        <sysproperty key="javatest.preferences.file" value="${javatest.preferences.file}"/>
+
+            <arg value="democonfig.jti"/>
+            <arg value="demotemplate.jtm"/>
+        </java>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="jar" depends="init">
+        <jar destfile="${tests.tempdir}/${ant.project.name}.jar" basedir="${tests.classesdir}" />
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="run" depends="jar">
+        <junit printsummary="yes" showoutput="true" dir="${tests.tempdir}">
+
+            <sysproperty key="jt_gui_test.QSdefault" value="true" />
+            <sysproperty key="jt_gui_test.name" value="${product.name}" />
+            <sysproperty key="jt_gui_test.showWarnings" value="${jt_gui_test.showWarnings}" />
+            <sysproperty key="jt_gui_test.ignoreDepricated" value="${jt_gui_test.ignoreDepricated}" />
+            <sysproperty key="jt_gui_test.not_run_knownfail" value="${jt_gui_test.not_run_knownfail}" />
+            <sysproperty key="jt_gui_test.override_knownfail" value="${jt_gui_test.override_knownfail}" /><!-- -->
+            <sysproperty key="javatest.security.noSecurityManager" value="true" />
+            <sysproperty key="javatest.desktop.file" value="${javatest.directory.file}"/>
+            <sysproperty key="javatest.preferences.file" value="${javatest.preferences.file}"/>
+
+            <classpath refid="classpath" />
+
+            <formatter type="xml" />
+            <formatter type="plain" />
+
+            <batchtest fork="true" todir="${report.dir}" unless="testfile">
+                <fileset dir="${tests.gui.srcpath}" >
+                    <include name="**/*0.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*1.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*2.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*3.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*4.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*5.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*6.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*7.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*8.java" />
+                    <include name="**/*9.java" />
+                </fileset>
+            </batchtest>
+            <batchtest fork="true" todir="${report.dir}" if="testfile">
+                <fileset dir="${tests.gui.srcpath}">
+                    <include name="**/${testfile}"/>
+                </fileset>
+            </batchtest>
+        </junit>
+
+        <antcall target="genHtmlReport"/>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="genHtmlReport">
+        <delete dir="${htmlreport.dir}"/>
+        <mkdir dir="${htmlreport.dir}"/>
+
+                <junitreport todir="${htmlreport.dir}">
+                        <fileset dir="${report.dir}">
+                                <include name="*.xml"/>
+                        </fileset>
+                        <report todir="${htmlreport.dir}"/>
+                </junitreport>
+        </target>
+
+    <target name="report" depends="run">
+        <exec executable="cp" >
+            <arg value="${datapath}/failed.sh" />
+            <arg value="${datapath}/summary.sh" />
+            <arg value="${report.dir}" />
+        </exec>
+        <exec executable="./summary.sh" dir="${report.dir}" />
+        <exec executable="./failed.sh" dir="${report.dir}" />
+
+        <junitreport todir="${report.dir}">
+            <fileset dir="${report.dir}">
+                <include name="*.xml"/>
+            </fileset>
+            <report todir="${report.dir}"/>
+        </junitreport>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="genreport">
+                <junitreport todir="${report.dir}">
+                        <fileset dir="${report.dir}">
+                                <include name="*.xml"/>
+                        </fileset>
+                        <report todir="${report.dir}"/>
+                </junitreport>
+    </target>
+
+    <target name="clean">
+        <delete dir="${TESTS_BUILD_DIR}" />
+    </target>
+</project>

+# Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
+# or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
+# questions.
+
+LINE="============================================================"
+
+FILE=ERRORS.txt
+
+rm $FILE 2> /dev/null
+for i in $(grep -l ERROR TEST-*.txt); do
+    echo $i | sed 's/TEST-//; s/\.txt$//' >> $FILE
+    echo $LINE >> $FILE
+    sed -n '/ERROR/,$p' < $i >> $FILE
+    echo $LINE >> $FILE
+done

+

+id=DemoTS_tags_1.0
+

+classpath=lib/jtdemots.jar

+finder=com.sun.javatest.finder.TagTestFinder

+script=com.sun.javatest.lib.StdTestScript

+interview=com.sun.demots.DemoTSInterview

+keywords=

+# Please specify location of jhall.jar here - for compilation
+jhall.binaries=https://jpg-data.us.oracle.com/artifactory/re-release-local/jdk/8u152/b02/bundles/solaris-x64/orig/pkgarchive/SUNWj8dev/reloc/jdk/instances/jdk1.8.0/lib/visualvm/platform/modules/ext
+jhalljar = ./src/lib/jh.jar
+
+# needed only at runtime
+jhjar = ./src/lib/jh.jar
+
+# JUnit Library - Version 4 currently used to compile 3 and 4 support
+junit.binaries=https://jpg-data.us.oracle.com/artifactory/jcenter-cache/junit/junit/4.13.2
+hamcrest-core.binaries=https://jpg-data.us.oracle.com/artifactory/jcenter-cache/org/hamcrest/hamcrest-core/1.3
+hamcrestlib=./src/lib/hamcrest.jar
+junitlib = ./src/lib/junit.jar
+
+# Jemmy Library - it is used only for gui testing that are optional
+jemmy.binaries=https://jpg-data.us.oracle.com/artifactory/remote-repos/org/netbeans/jemmy/2.2.7.5
+jemmylib = ./src/lib/jemmy.jar
+
+# Please specify JavaTest Library Location
+javatest.re.dir=https://jpg-data.us.oracle.com/artifactory/re-release-local/javatest/6.0/b17
+javatest.binaries=${javatest.re.dir}/binaries/javatest
+javatestjar_path = ./javatest.jar
+
+product.name = JT
+
+# Please specify location where the build distribution (output) will be created
+BUILD_DIR = build
+
+javatest.directory.file=../build/jtdir
+javatest.preferences.file=../build/jtpref
